sentences.en: A small boat edged down upon the big steamer.
sentences.cn: 一只小艇缓缓驶近那艘大轮船.

sentences.en: A steamer takes on a pilot before coming into a strange harbour.
sentences.cn: 轮船进入陌生的港口前要雇用引航员.

sentences.en: Don't scald your hands when you open the steamer.
sentences.cn: 掀笼屉时小心热气嘘着手.

sentences.en: Gerald was fickle, in a week he would be in love with some girl he met on the steamer .
sentences.cn: 杰拉尔德是三心二意；不出一星期他就会爱上他在轮船上遇见的某个姑娘。

sentences.en: Joseph watched a shady-looking bunch playing cards aboard a Mississippi steamer.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫看到一群可疑的人在密西西比河的一艘轮船上打牌。

sentences.en: Remove the vegetables from the steamer when they are three-quarters cooked.
sentences.cn: 将蔬菜蒸至大半熟后从蒸锅里捞出。

sentences.en: The cargo has been transshipped into a river steamer.
sentences.cn: 货物已载入一艘内河轮船上.

sentences.en: The island is connected by a steamer service to the mainland.
sentences.cn: 轮船航运把该岛与大陆联系起来.

sentences.en: The steamed buns fresh from the steamer were nice and warm.
The steamer arrived at the quay with the tourists packed like sardines.
sentences.cn: 汽船驶抵码头,船上的旅客拥挤不堪.

sentences.en: The steamer arrived in harbor last night.
The steamer calls at several ports along the way.
sentences.cn: 一路上，汽船在好几个港口停靠。

sentences.en: The steamer makes 20 knots an hour.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船的时速是20海里.
这艘轮船曾停靠3个港口。

sentences.en: The steamer will go west by north.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船将向西偏北方向航行.

sentences.en: To welcome the steamer, a long line of honor guards marched all in step.
sentences.cn: 为了欢迎轮船的到来，一支仪仗队步调合拍的行进着。

sentences.en: We were together only during the few days the steamer took from Calcutta to Madras, but it became quite evident that depth of friendship does not depend upon length of acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 我们只是在从加尔各答到马德拉斯的轮船上呆了几天，但很明显，友谊的深厚并不取决于认识的长久。
你们的轮船什么时候启航?

words.tran_cn: 蒸汽的；雾重的，潮湿的；充满蒸汽的
蒸汽压路机；压倒对方的手段
用压路机把…压平；以势压倒

trans.tran_cn: 汽船，轮船，蒸锅，蒸汽机，用蒸汽工作的人
